subject: OFFER FOR FIXED TERM CONTRACT
opening_message: Congratulations on your new assignment with Manpower services.
terms_and_conditions: Any statutory dues like PF, ESI, Bonus etc, if applicable, will be Paid / Deducted as per law.\\\\All taxes will be deducted as applicable by law.

acceptance_instructions: If you wish to accept this offer, kindly send the accepted copy of the same along with a copy of your accepted resignation letter or relieving letter (if applicable). In case the signed acceptance and required documents are not received by Manpower within 7 days of the offer date, Manpower at their discretion reserve their right to treat this offer as withdrawn automatically without further notice.
